Message: The user completes the submission of the form
Hi there! How can I assist you today?
You guys help me verify my account

Sure, I can help with that! Could you please provide the following information to proceed with the business verification?

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Account Email
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number

Once you have this information ready, I'll guide you on the next steps.
I am just an individual, can I run ads?
Yes, individuals can run ads on our platform! You don't need to be a business entity to advertise. If you have any specific questions or need help getting started, feel free to ask!

But now my account is showing "Your profile is pending verification. If verification isn't completed within 48 hours, please contact adsupport@newsbreak.com for help" I need your help to approve my account

I understand your concern. To proceed with the verification process, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number

Once we receive this information, our team will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. Thank you for your cooperation!

I understand your concern. To proceed with the verification process, please provide the following details by emailing adsupport@newsbreak.com with the subject line: Business Verification –

- Company's full address
- Company's legal entity name
- Company's EHID or DUNS number
- Primary contact person's name
- Company's phone number

Once we receive this information, our team will conduct a thorough review and update you on your account status. Thank you for your cooperation!
But I am an individual and do not have those things? So individuals cannot run ads?

I apologize for the confusion. Individuals can indeed run ads on our platform. If you're facing issues with verification as an individual, please reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com explaining your situation. They will guide you on how to proceed without business-specific details.
So please help me and guide me.

I understand your situation as an individual. Please email adsupport@newsbreak.com with your account details and explain that you are an individual looking to run ads. They will assist you further in the verification process.
